entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:16 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
